title: Drawing, "View Overlooking San Francisco, On The Road Between Popayan and Pasto, Valley Of The Patia River, Colombia", August 13, 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on light brown paper
markings: Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with numbers at various locations, and at top center:   In the hollows of the hills and mountains grow / a few trees & bushes seaming out the lines - also a few scattered / trees; again at upper right:   2 Lake [?] 3. Elevated table brown / with salmon rocks or earth, light, / 4 - greenish blackish, brown velvety / 5 - brown green / 6 very high; again at center:   Trees / Trees; again at lower center:   Broken with spots and dots of bright yellow or orange soil and grey rocks; again at lower right:  View overlooking san Francisco on the road / between Popayan & Pasto / Aug. 13 - / 53 ; at bottom right:   Valley of Patia
description: Horizontal view of a large valley with a stream fills the middleground and is surrounded by hills, with high mountain ranges in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "View Overlooking San Francisco, On The Road Between Popayan and Pasto, Valley Of The Patia River, Colombia", August 13, 1853.
August 13, 1853. Graphite, brush and white gouache on light brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-92.
